thread.section_title: DIY Awards Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DIY Awards | diyawards.com
thread.title: Jan

author: Jan
title: Jan
text: I ordered a police chief crystal award for my husband who is retiring after 35 years and I was looking for something unique that "wowed" me and I came acrossed DIY awards and found the perfect gift. The girl on the phone who contacted me(sorry I can't remember her name) but she was really great working with me to get exactly what I was looking for. I absolutely love how it turned out and I'm sure my husband will too! Thank you DIY Awards!
